<script is:inline>
const searchInput = document.getElementById("command-search");
const commandItems = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll("#command-list li"));
const filterCommands = () => {
	const query = searchInput?.value?.trim().toLowerCase() ?? "";
	for (const item of commandItems) {
		const name = item.getAttribute("data-name")?.toLowerCase() ?? "";
		const description = item.getAttribute("data-description")?.toLowerCase() ?? "";
		const matches = !query || name.includes(query) || description.includes(query);
		item.style.display = matches ? "" : "none";
	}
};
searchInput?.addEventListener("input", filterCommands);
</script>

## Categories

### A
- [/activities](./activities) — Miscellaneous activities you can do.
- [/ask](./ask) — Ask a yes/no question to the bot and receive an answer.

### B
- [/bank](./bank) — See your minions bank.
- [/bingo](./bingo) — Bingo!
- [/bossrecords](./bossrecords) — Shows your OSRS boss records.
- [/botleagues](./botleagues) — Compete in the OSB/BSO Leagues.
- [/bs](./bs) — Search your minions bank.
- [/build](./build) — Sends your minion to train Construction by building things.
- [/buy](./buy) — Allows you to purchase items.

### C
- [/ca](./ca) — Combat Achievements
- [/casket](./casket) — Simulate opening lots of clue caskets.
- [/choose](./choose) — Have the bot make a choice from a list of things.
- [/chop](./chop) — Chop logs using the Woodcutting skill.
- [/cl](./cl) — See your Collection Log.
- [/claim](./claim) — Claim prizes, rewards and other things.
- [/clue](./clue) — Send your minion to complete clue scrolls.
- [/clues](./clues) — See your OSRS clue scores.
- [/config](./config) — Commands configuring settings and options.
- [/cook](./cook) — Cook things using the cooking skill.
- [/craft](./craft) — Craft items with the Crafting skill.
- [/create](./create) — Allows you to create items, like godswords or spirit shields - and pack barrows armor sets.

### D
- [/data](./data) — View various pieces of data.
- [/drop](./drop) — Drop items from your bank.
- [/drycalc](./drycalc) — Calculate your drystreak chance.

### F
- [/fake](./fake) — Generate fake images of getting loot.
- [/fakepm](./fakepm) — Generate fake images of PMs.
- [/farming](./farming) — Allows you to do Farming related things.
- [/finish](./finish) — Simulate finishing a CL.
- [/fish](./fish) — Send your minion to fish fish.
- [/fletch](./fletch) — Fletch items with the Fletching skill.

### G
- [/gamble](./gamble) — Partake in various gambling activities.
- [/ge](./ge) — Exchange grandly with other players on the bot!
- [/gear](./gear) — Manage, equip, unequip your gear.
- [/gearpresets](./gearpresets) — Manage, equip, unequip your gear presets.
- [/gift](./gift) — Create gifts for other users, or open one you received.
- [/giveaway](./giveaway) — Giveaway items from your bank to other players.
- [/gp](./gp) — See your current GP balance.

### H
- [/help](./help) — Get information and help with the bot.
- [/hunt](./hunt) — Hunt creatures with the Hunter skill.

### I
- [/invite](./invite) — Shows the invite link for the bot.

### K
- [/k](./k) — Send your minion to kill things.
- [/kc](./kc) — See your OSRS kc for a monster/boss.
- [/kill](./kill) — Simulate killing monsters.

### L
- [/laps](./laps) — Do laps on Agility courses to train Agility.
- [/lb](./lb) — Simulate killing monsters.
- [/light](./light) — Light logs to train Firemaking.
- [/loot](./loot) — View your loot tracker data.
- [/lvl](./lvl) — See a level in your OSRS stats.

### M
- [/m](./m) — See your current minion status and helpful buttons.
- [/mass](./mass) — Arrange to mass bosses, killing them as a group.
- [/mine](./mine) — Send your minion to mine things.
- [/minigames](./minigames) — Send your minion to do various minigames.
- [/minion](./minion) — Manage and control your minion.
- [/mix](./mix) — Mix potions to train Herblore.

### O
- [/offer](./offer) — Offer bones or bird eggs.
- [/open](./open) — Open an item (caskets, keys, boxes, etc).

### P
- [/patreon](./patreon) — Shows the patreon link for the bot, where you can donate.
- [/pay](./pay) — Send GP to another user.
- [/poh](./poh) — Allows you to access and build in your POH.
- [/poll](./poll) — Create a reaction poll.
- [/price](./price) — Looks up the price of an item.

### R
- [/raid](./raid) — Send your minion to do raids - CoX or ToB.
- [/redeem](./redeem) — Redeem a code you received.
- [/roll](./roll) — Roll a random number from 1, up to a limit.
- [/rp](./rp) — Admin tools second set
- [/runecraft](./runecraft) — Sends your minion to craft runes with essence, or craft tiaras.

### S
- [/sacrifice](./sacrifice) — Sacrifice items from your bank to the bot.
- [/sell](./sell) — Sell items from your bank to the bot for GP.
- [/simulate](./simulate) — Simulate various OSRS related things.
- [/slayer](./slayer) — Slayer skill commands
- [/smelt](./smelt) — Smelt ores/items.
- [/smith](./smith) — Smith things using the Smithing skill.
- [/stats](./stats) — Check the stats of a OSRS account.
- [/steal](./steal) — Sends your minion to steal to train Thieving.

### T
- [/tokkulshop](./tokkulshop) — Buy or sell items from the Tzhaar shops.
- [/tools](./tools) — Various tools and miscellaneous commands.
- [/trade](./trade) — Allows you to trade items with other players.
- [/trivia](./trivia) — Try to answer a random trivia question!

### U
- [/use](./use) — Use items/things.

### W
- [/wiki](./wiki) — Search the official OSRS wiki.

### X
- [/xp](./xp) — See your OSRS xp.
